welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nanuet, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, shopping destinations, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the wonderful things this city has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights and is the oldest operating terminal at LaGuardia Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is currently undergoing major renovations.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly Delta Air Lines and its partners, and offers a variety of food and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly American Airlines and its partners, and offers a variety of food and shopping options.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a code from certain airlines or lounges.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stewart Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stewart Airport is used for shipping and receiving of goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments for the airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration.
